Hetu
Kilesagocchaka
Saṃkiliṭṭhaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
51.
3951Saṃkiliṭṭho dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  saṃkiliṭṭhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
3952Saṃkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  saṃkiliṭṭhā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
3953Saṃkiliṭṭho dhammo saṃkiliṭṭhassa ca asaṃkiliṭṭhassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  saṃkiliṭṭhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
3954Asaṃkiliṭṭho dhammo asaṃkiliṭṭhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  asaṃkiliṭṭhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo; paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
